segments.text: I am trying to decide what school to apply to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you thinking about a public school or a private one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not sure . What's the difference between them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Public schools are usually state funded , whereas private schools usually get their funding elsewhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One isn't necessarily better than the other . It depends a lot on the school administration and the teachers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hear you have to wear uniforms at private schools .
segments.speaker: S1
